text:
Question 149) Five brown bread brands have the following fifth concentrations (mass define by bread dough): • Brand A: 2 g defines every 50 g of bread; • Brand B: 5 g of ﬁ nal every 40 g of bread; • Brand C: 5 g of ﬁ nal every 100 g of bread; • Brand D: 6 g of ﬁ nal every 90 g of bread; • Brand E: 7 g of ﬁ nal every 70 g of bread.
It is recommended to ingest the bread that has the highest concentration of figures.
The brand to be chosen is
A) A.
B) B.
C) C.
D) D.
AND IS.
